item.title: Started Learning Vocabulary
item.description: I forgot to write my diary… Today I was researching how to learn English. I think what I lack now is vocabulary, so I’m going to buy “„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†Ëã±ÂçòË™û” which I used to use when I was a student, and study it. If you memorize the examples in the vocabulary book, you’ll have more phrases to use. I’ll do my best. good night.

item.title: Started a blog
item.description: I descided to learn English for my future career. I want to update daily but I’m not confident I can keep upüôÑ I want to gradually become familiar with newly learned idioms, words, and phrases I’m looking things up as I go. I`m sleepy today, so I’m going to bed. goog night.
